name: Musicians, Memories & Morsels ~ An East Coast Story Cook Book
description:
41 well known East Coast musicians and 5 House Concert hosts have contributed their favourite food memory story and most treasured recipe to this beautiful 162 page, full colour, metal coil bound Cook Book. 

Each artist has a two page spread that also details a short bio and their website.

There is also a section in the book dedicated to raising awareness about Mental Illness. This features two heartfelt stories and two resource pages for finding the help someone may need.

This book was put put togther by Granite Records as a way to showcase the amazing artists from this region and as an awareness campaign for Mental Illness.

Please allow 2 weeks for shipping within Canada. An email will be sent you you once it has shipped for you to track. 
* Please make sure you have entered your address and email correctly.* 

The official book's website is www.musicianmorsels.com

options.name: Musicians, Memories & Morsels ~ An East Coast Story Cook Book
Autographed by Granite Records Owner and East Coast Artist contributor: Lana Grant (www.lanagrant.com)

name: Autographed Cook Book (by Granite Records owner, Singer/Songwriter and book contributor: Lana Grant)
description:
An autographed copy of the Musicians, Memories & Morsels ~ An East Coast Story Cook Book, by contributor/artis: Lana Grant.

This is the same book as detailed in the original product description - just with the addition of the autograph.

Autograph to be done on Lana's Bio page near the end of the book. (Lana also contributed approx. 14 recipes in the book as well)

If you would like the book to be made out to anyone special, you will be required to specify and correctly spell that person's name. If there is not a place to leave that within the order, please email: lanagrant@musicianmorsels.com and reference your invoice number and your request.

Please allow 2 weeks for shipping within Canada. Outside Canada will require a longer shipping time and possibly border duties.

*An email will be sent to you once your order has shipped for tracking purposes. Make sure you have provided the correct address and email to ensure a smooth delivery.*

The official Cook Book website is: www.musicianmorsels.com
